Author: GalimahB
Title: Your Guide to Azure Community Activations at Microsoft Ignite 2025
EnhancedContent:
[Microsoft Ignite 2025](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/home) is right around the corner! From November 18â€“21 in San Francisco, weâ€™re excited to bring the Azure community together for four days of learning, connection, and fun! Whether youâ€™re joining us onsite at the Moscone Center or tuning in online, the Community Space will be buzzing with MVP meetups, interactive theater sessions, and plenty of opportunities to network.

This is the first in a series of posts highlighting what you can expect at Microsoft Ignite. Today, weâ€™re spotlighting Azure Community activations across Infrastructure, AI, Data, and MVP programs. In upcoming posts, weâ€™ll dive deeper into sessions tailored for IT professionals, developers, and even first-time attendees.

**Azure Infrastructure**

Microsoft Ignite is packed with practical insights to help you migrate, modernize, and secure workloads.

- Learn how to [Troubleshooting AKS networking with Agentic AI](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1004?source=sessions) and strengthen your [AI workload resiliency with Azureâ€™s networking stack.](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1005?source=sessions)
- Dive into migration best practices with sessions on moving data for analytics, lessons from Azure MVPs, and community insights from real-world projects.
- And donâ€™t miss the fan favorite: [Learn Infrastructure-as-Code through Minecraft](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1104?source=sessions) â€”where cloud automation meets creativity.

**AI & Agents**

If youâ€™re passionate about AI, the community sessions will put you at the center of whatâ€™s next.

- Connect with peers at the [Global AI Community meetup](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1008?source=sessions).
- Get a sneak peek at whatâ€™s coming with [Azure AI Insiders](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1009?source=sessions).
- Hear directly from MVPs and Microsoft leaders on [shaping the future of Azure AI Foundry](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1111?source=sessions) and how AI is transforming customer innovation.

**Azure Data**

For those focused on data, Microsoft Ignite is your chance to learn, influence, and connect.

- Share your feedback on [SQL Server Management Studio](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1000?source=sessions) and [Copilot in SSMS](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1031?source=sessions).
- Bring your toughest questions to a [Q&A with Azure Data Leadership](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1113?source=sessions).
- And join the community to explore [real-world data intelligence solutions](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1100?source=sessions) and career-building opportunities across the data ecosystem.

**MVP Program**

Interested in becoming a [Microsoft MVP](https://mvp.microsoft.com/mvp) or expanding your community impact?

- Learn how to get nominated and grow your influence in [So you want to become an MVP?](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1140?source=sessions)
- Join program leads and MVPs to hear their stories in [Becoming an MVP in Azure, AI, or the Data Platform](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/sessions/COM1065?source=sessions).
These sessions are the perfect place to start if youâ€™re looking to give back and level up your community journey.

Stay Connected Year-Round

The conversations donâ€™t stop after Microsoft Ignite. Join the communities that keep the learning going:

- [AKS Community (Infrastructure)](https://www.youtube.com/@theakscommunity)
- [Azure AI Foundry (AI)](https://techcommunity.microsoft.com/category/azure-ai-foundry)
- [Global AI Community (AI)](https://globalai.community/)
- [Fabric Community (Data)](https://community.fabric.microsoft.com/)
- [Azure Data Community (Data)](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/sql-server/community?activetab=pivot:cosmosdbtab)
- [Fellow Developers](https://developer.microsoft.com/en-us/community)

And this is just the beginning. Microsoft Ignite is packed with opportunities to learn from experts, connect with peers, and explore whatâ€™s next with Azure. Stay tuned for our upcoming posts, where weâ€™ll share curated session highlights designed for different audiences to help you make the most of your Microsoft Ignite experience.

ðŸ‘‰ Be sure to mark your calendar, start building your schedule, and get ready to be inspired at [Microsoft Ignite 2025](https://ignite.microsoft.com/en-US/home)

Updated Sep 23, 2025
